<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Yellow Musk Brute](/Monsters.aspx?ID=869)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

A creature transformed by a yellow musk creeper's tendrils boring into its brain becomes a yellow musk thrall if it's Small or Medium, or a yellow musk brute if Large (a Small creature becomes a Small thrall rather than a Medium one). The transformation takes 1 hour. A yellow musk thrall takes only the most rudimentary of actions: bringing the yellow musk creeper water and new creatures to infest. After a few days (or if the creeper dies), the thrall wanders off into the wilderness and falls dead within 24 hours. The body of a deceased thrall sprouts a new yellow musk creeper within hours of its death, becoming a fully grown plant within 24 hours.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Plant](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Yellow Musk Brute](/Monsters.aspx?ID=869)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=125" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 301 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +4; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** -3

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -2
</row>

**Slow** A yellow musk brute is permanently [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) and can't use reactions.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 15 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +3 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 45

**Immunities**
[mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)

**Weaknesses**
fire 10

**Entangling Tendrils** ([aura Entangling Tendrils](/Traits.aspx?ID=206)) 5 feet. Grasping tendrils extend out from the brute. When the brute ends its movement next to a creature, or a creature ends its turn next to the brute, that creature must succeed at a DC 15 Reflex save or be [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) by the tendrils.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +11 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d12+5 bludgeoning plus [Improved Push](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=29) 5 feet

**Limb Extension** <actions string="Free Action" />  **Trigger** The yellow musk brute is reduced to 15 HP or fewer; **Effect** Creeper tendrils tear through the brute's limbs, causing its forearms to tear loose. The brute's melee reach increases by 5 feet.

**Pollen Touch**   When the brute strikes a creature, that creature is exposed to yellow musk creeper pollen, as [Spray Pollen](/Monsters.aspx?ID=867) (DC 15). The creature is fascinated by the yellow musk creeper that spawned the brute, not by the brute itself.

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="">Recovery from Thralldom</title>

A creature that's transformed into a yellow musk thrall or brute doesn't die right away, although it no longer retains its personality, memories, or abilities as long as it exists as a thrall. Within the first few days after its transformation, a thrall or brute can be restored to its normal life with any magical effect that can remove disease or a 1-hour procedure that requires a successful DC 22 [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) (expert) check and deals 2d6 slashing damage to the thrall or brute.
</aside>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-162" />
name: Yellow Musk Brute
